content: Singaporean TV seriesThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Precious Babes" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(November 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Precious Babes** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 3个女人一个宝) is a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) [Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language) family drama produced by MatrixVision, revolving around the lives of three women who are childhood friends. It made its debut on [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)'s free-to-air channel, [MediaCorp Channel 8](/wiki/Channel_8_(Singaporean_TV_channel)) on 9 June 2010 and ended on 6 July 2010. It stars [Ann Kok](/wiki/Ann_Kok), [Cynthia Koh](/wiki/Cynthia_Koh), [Eelyn Kok](/wiki/Eelyn_Kok), [Qi Yuwu](/wiki/Qi_Yuwu), [Zheng Geping](/wiki/Zheng_Geping) & [Alan Tern](/wiki/Alan_Tern) as the casts of the series. Consisting of 20 episodes, the drama was screened every weekday night at 9.00 pm. It is also a mid year blockbuster for 2010. This drama made its rerun from 30 June 2011 and ended on 27 July 2011. This drama is also imported on one of [Malaysia](/wiki/Malaysia)'s free-to-air channel, [NTV7](/wiki/NTV7), weekdays at 6.00pm, made its debut on 6 June 2011 and ended on 1 July 2011. ## Cast CastCharacterDescription**Main Cast**[Ann Kok](/wiki/Ann_Kok)Lin HuixianWeiming's wife Katie and Zhiqing's friend [Fashion designer](/wiki/Fashion_design#Fashion_designers)[Cynthia Koh](/wiki/Cynthia_Koh)Katie OngJovan's wife Huixian and Zhiqing's friend Xuanxuan's mother [Fashion designer](/wiki/Fashion_design#Fashion_designers)[Eelyn Kok](/wiki/Eelyn_Kok)Cui ZhiqingRenxian's wife Huixian and Katie's friend One of the [directors](/wiki/Television_director) of MatrixVision[Qi Yuwu](/wiki/Qi_Yuwu)Yuan RenxianZhiqing's husband [Actor](/wiki/Actor) of MatrixVision[Zheng Geping](/wiki/Zheng_Geping)Fu WeimingHuixian's husband Weide's brother One of the [directors](/wiki/Television_director) of MatrixVision[Alan Tern](/wiki/Alan_Tern)JovanKatie's husband Xuanxuan's father**Other Cast**Wang Xiu YunWu XiuxiangMother of Weiming and Weide[Priscelia Chan](/wiki/Priscelia_Chan)Lin AilinWeide's wife Mother of the Binbin brothers[Andie Chen](/wiki/Andie_Chen)Fu WeideWeiming's younger brother Ailin's husbandWu Yu XiangHe XuemeiZhiqing's mother[Zhu Houren](/wiki/Zhu_Houren)Cui GuoyaoZhiqing's father ## Accolades YearCeremonyAwardNominee(s)ResultRef.(/wiki/Star_Awards_2011)[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards)[Best Supporting Actor](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Supporting_Actor)[Andie Chen](/wiki/Andie_Chen)Nominated This Singaporean television-related article is a stub.
